description: 欢迎各位在此文件中添加翻译文档！
Translation in this json is welcomed!
【格式】：语种标识符在第一层，紧跟对象里面放每一项待翻译的键值对。
如果您添加了新语种的翻译，则还需要在config-available里添加新语言的标识符。
config字段的default项指向当所选语种不可用或为空时使用的默认语言。
[ FORMAT ]: language identifier is in the first layer, and the object followed should contain every key-value set of translation.
If you introduced in a new translation, you will need to add its identifier in 'config - available' as well.
Item 'default' under 'config' refers to the default language when language you would like to choose is not available.
